name: PlotBox Inc.
description: Developer of cemetery management software designed to facilitate cemetery operation services. The company's software offers records management that brings all deceased records together into a quickly searchable database that includes images of headstones and paper records, generates pre and at-need contracts with ease, interprets financial data as well as manages all the administration related to burials, and cremations including finance and reporting, enabling clients to generate leads and revenue for cemeteries and improves service levels for families.
one_liner: Developer of cemetery management software designed to facilitate cemetery operation services.
